splash.intro:
This is a compilation of my extracurricular activities and passions during my high school years. They capture highlights from:
- swimming
- running
- cycling
- ballet
- flute
- piano
- triathlon
- environmental fieldwork
- summer immersion programs

slides.title: NYSSSA Ballet Audition
slides.blurb: Audition photo for NYSSSA Ballet (New York State Summer School of the Arts) and Boston Ballet.

slides.title: The Music of Jethro Tull
slides.blurb: Performing the music of Jethro Tull with Woodstock’s Paul Green Rock Academy.

slides.title: NYSSSA Photo Shoot
slides.blurb: Photo taken at Skidmore College Campus as a part of a NYSSSA ballet photoshoot. Skidmore provided room and board for the program.

slides.title: NYSSSA Photo Shoot
slides.blurb: Photo taken at the National Museum of Dance, where NYSSSA’s ballet classes were held.

slides.title: SOS4Kids
slides.blurb: Winning the 2017 SOS4Kids (a local triathlon) for the third year in a row.

slides.title: 2nd Place at Section 9 Championships
slides.blurb: Placing 2nd in the 200 Individual Medley at the 2017 Section 9 Championship Meet, breaking my own school record from the year before.

slides.title: Snow Queen
slides.blurb: Performing the role of the Snow Queen in the New Paltz School of Ballet’s annual Nutcracker performance.

slides.title: Tickets to the United Nations
slides.blurb: Girls Leadership Worldwide tickets to the UN briefings in New York.

slides.title: At the United Nations
slides.blurb: Outside one of the briefing rooms at UN New York with the Girls Leadership Worldwide program.

slides.title: Girls Leadership Worldwide
slides.blurb: The Girls Leadership Worldwide final awards ceremony, where we received our certificates of completion from the State Senate.

slides.title: 200 Individual Medley
slides.blurb: Competing in the 200 Individual Medley at the 2018 Section 9 Championship Meet, breaking my own school record from the year before and placing 3rd.

slides.title: NPHS Jazz Band
slides.blurb: Playing keyboard for the New Paltz High School Jazz Band in the winter concert.

slides.title: Track Invitational
slides.blurb: Anchoring the 4 x 800m relay at a 2019 track invitational.

slides.title: NPHS Concert Band
slides.blurb: Accompanying the New Paltz High School Band on keyboard at the 2019 spring concert.

slides.title: NYSSMA
slides.blurb: Performing at the 2019 NYSSMA Spring Festival.

slides.title: New York State DEC
slides.blurb: Working in the field as part of my internship with the New York State Department of Environmental Conservation.

slides.title: Backstroke
slides.blurb: Winning the 100 backstroke at a swim invitational.

slides.title: Medley Relay
slides.blurb: Leading off the winning medley relay at a dual meet.

slides.title: 3rd Place at Section 9 Championships
slides.blurb: Placing 3rd in the 100 backstroke at the 2019 Section 9 Championship Meet.

slides.title: NPHS at 2019 State Meet
slides.blurb: The New Paltz High School 200 freestyle relay at the 2019 New York State Championship Meet.

slides.title: The Cabin Challenge 2020
slides.blurb: Competing in the Cabin Challenge, a 76 mile bike race with over 5,000 feet of elevation gain.

slides.title: Youngest Female Rider
slides.blurb: The Cabin Challenge awards ceremony, accepting the award for youngest female competitor.

slides.title: 12th Rock Cross Country
slides.blurb: Competing in the 12th Rock Cross Country fall race series.
